name: template.data.gouv.fr
description: Template CSS pour data.gouv.fr et compagnie.

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && yarn dist-css && yarn dist-site
scripts.dist-site: copyfiles CNAME images/* images/*/* images/icons/external/* fonts/*/* index.html dist
scripts.prepublish-css: postcss --output dist/main.css src/css/index.css && NODE_ENV=production postcss --output dist/main.min.css src/css/index.css
scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist && yarn prepublish-css && copyfiles images/* images/icons/external/* images/favicons/* fonts/**/* dist
